column2: 65-74 Male  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $4$4$4$This med did work well for me with my panic attacks and social anxiety. Still there there
column3: but not as extreme. At leaset I can talk one on one with  a stranger...Took about a week to take effect.

column1: 2$Condition: Major Depressive Disorder$8/18/2014 6:30:45 PM$Reviewer: fire godess
column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$3$5$"Have been on this medication for about 20 yrs. now. It worked on day one for me - noticed an immediate change. For that reason
column3: I've never considered changing. I did experience weight gain (which for females is kind of depressing on it's own). I definately experienced loss of libido and that's been disturbing to me. It is for these reasons that I'm considering changing to another anti-depressant. But this will work!
